p: Bone marrow stromal cell line M2-10B4 (CRL-1972) and NIH-3T3 fibroblasts (CRL-1658) were purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC). The cells were maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% FCS, 1% L-glutamine, and 1% penicillin/streptomycin. C57BL/6 murine embryonic fibroblasts (MEFs) were prepared in-house and maintained as described previously [ 64].
